com.team.shared.engine.engine

Class MenuUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team.shared.engine.engine.MenuUI

  • public class MenuUI
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines the Menu's User-Interface.
    Version:
    2.0

      • commandViaInput

        @Deprecated
private static void commandViaInput()
        Deprecated. 
        this method determines what command to invoke according to the user's number input.

        Note: the MenuUI.Keys.LOAD_SAVED_XML_FILE command is the same as the MenuUI.Keys.LOAD_XML_FILE command.

      • inputOrderSymbolAndGetMatchingStock

        private static Stock inputOrderSymbolAndGetMatchingStock()
                                                  throws java.io.IOException
        This method gets a String Stock-Symbol from the user.
        Returns:
        Stock with the matching Symbol (if exist).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case of an incorrect input - means that there is no such Symbol available in the Engine's Stocks.

                                         throws java.io.IOException
        This method gets a OrderDirection from the user.
        Returns:
        OrderDirection.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case of an incorrect input.

      • getPositiveLong

        private static long getPositiveLong()
                             throws java.io.IOException
        This method gets a long input from the user, and checks if it is a positive number.
        Returns:
        a positive long number.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the input provided was not a positive number.

      • getNonNegativeLong

        private static long getNonNegativeLong()
                                throws java.io.IOException
        This method gets a long input from the user, and checks if it is a non-negative number.
        Returns:
        a non-negative long number.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the input provided was not a non-negative number.

      • insertOrder

        private static Order insertOrder(Stock stock,
                                 OrderDirection orderDirection,
                                 OrderType orderType,
                                 long quantity,
                                 long desiredLimitPrice,
                                 java.lang.String requestingUserName)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        This method creates an Order with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        stock - the Stock that matches the Symbol given.
        quantity - the Quantity of the stocks.
        orderDirection - whether the order is to Buy or Sell.
        orderType - one of the Order-Types:
        • OrderType.LMT.
        • OrderType.MKT.
        • OrderType.FOK.
        • OrderType.IOC.
        desiredLimitPrice - takes action only for OrderType.LMT OrderTypes.
        requestingUserName - is the User name that requested this Order
        Returns:
        the newly placed order.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the Order build process failed.

      • run

        @Deprecated
public static void run()
        Deprecated. 
        Runs the MenuUI:
        • prints MenuUI.
        • gets an input from the user and executes a command.
